00027 #include "HDTLoader.h"
00028 
00029 HDTLoader::HDTLoader()
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 bool 
00034 HDTLoader::load(char* location)
00035 {
00036     DataTime t1, t2;
00037     getTime(&t1);
00038 
00039     cout.precision(4);
00040     
00041     cout << "[" << showpoint << t1.user - t1.user << "]  Loading HDT" << endl;
00042     
00043     getTime(&t2);
00044     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Reading Header" << endl;
00045     header = new Header();
00046     header->read(location);
00047     
00048     getTime(&t2);
00049     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Loading Dictionary" << endl;
00050     
00051     int mapping = header->getMapping();
00052     
00053     if ((mapping != MAPPING1) && (mapping != MAPPING2))
00054             cout << "   <ERROR> Mapping " << mapping << " is not supported" << endl;
00055 
00056     dictionary = new PlainDictionary(location, mapping, header->getD_separator(), header->getNsubjects(), header->getNpredicates(), header->getNobjects(), header->getSsubobj());
00057     
00058     getTime(&t2);
00059     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Loading Console" << endl;
00060     switch(header->getT_encoding())
00061     {
00062         case PLAIN:
00063             triples = new PlainTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(), header->getParsing(), location);
00064             break;
00065         case COMPACT:
00066             triples = new CompactTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(), header->getParsing(), location);
00067             break;
00068         case BITMAP:
00069             triples = new BitmapTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(), header->getParsing(), location);
00070             break;
00071         case K2TREE:
00072             cout << "   <WARNING> K2-tree Triples encoding is not currently supported" << endl;
00073             return false;
00074             break;
00075         default:
00076             cout << "   <ERROR> Current triples encoding  is not supported" << endl;
00077             return false;
00078     }
00079     
00080     return true;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void
00084 HDTLoader::console()
00085 {
00086     triples->console();
00087 }
00088 
00089 void
00090 HDTLoader::serialize(char *output, char *format)
00091 {
00092     triples->serialize(output,format);
00093 }
00094 
00095 HDTLoader::~HDTLoader()
00096 {
00097     delete header;
00098 }
